FAQ.question: How soon will I receive my refund?
FAQ.answer:
Refunds will be done via the initial 
payment mode and may take up to 15 working days. 
Please note that refund amount is subjected to 
conditions of the products.

FAQ.question: How to contact to company?
FAQ.answer:
Contact Us at 012-12345678 for 
assistance. Email us at Smart3Gamers@gmail.com. For more information : 
https://serious3gamers.wixsite.com/home

FAQ.question: What should I do if my item is damaged?
FAQ.answer:
If only one part from your product is damaged, we may be able to ship replacement parts 
from one of our stores. For the quickest resolution,
 we recommend visiting our S3GF store with the
 damaged product or part(s) along with your order 
confirmation or receipt. If you're unable to do so, 
please contact us. 012-12345678

FAQ.question: Are chemicals used in the manufacturing process of S3GF products?
FAQ.answer:
All S3GF products are tested and 
approved according to current regulations and 
standards. As a precautionary measure, S3GF has 
phased out several chemicals that could potentially 
be harmful, often ahead of legislation.

FAQ.question: Do your products contain lead?
FAQ.answer:
As of 2010, all S3GF products have 
been manufactured without lead.

FAQ.question: Do you recycle products?
FAQ.answer:
No, S3GF dont have recycle products 
program.

FAQ.question: Who owns the S3GF concept?
FAQ.answer:
Serious 3 Gamers Furniture (S3GF) is a new company which was established on 2022 January. 
The S3GF sells furniture that is related to the game area, such as gaming chairs, table, LED light, and 
some gaming computer accessories. The Owner of S3GF is Mr Gary.

FAQ.question: Where is S3GF store?
FAQ.answer: No 123, Taman Smart, Jalan King, 52100 Kuala Lumpur
